members.name: Myran Webb
members.bio: Myran Webb—codename Cyber—is the engineering mind and battlefield analyst of The Eclipse. His armor enhances his cognition, letting him reshape the environment with shields, drones, and holographic support for Jennifer and the Titans.
history: Grew up near the Celestial border in a family of engineers.
Met Jennifer during an Outer Darkness raid.
Developed the Cyber armor as a mental-augmentation defensive rig.
Joined The Eclipse as their primary tech defender.
members.notes: Prefers precision over power; often reworks the team's systems without being asked.

members.name: Kelsie Tidwell
members.bio: Kelsie Tidwell, Eliptic-Dancer, uses motion and light to misdirect enemies and guide allies. Her photokinetic trails synchronize perfectly with Jared's movements, giving the Titans strategic visual advantages.
history: Raised in a family of performers.
Met Jared during a Telestial scouting run.
Joined The Eclipse to support high-speed operations.
members.notes: Still canonically married to Jared in base timeline; relationship tension handled in story arcs.

members.name: James Connell
members.bio: James Connell—codename Guardian—is the emotional backbone of The Eclipse. His healing abilities keep Azure grounded, the Titans stabilized, and conflict from spiraling out of control.
history: First discovered his aura stabilizing street conflicts.
Met Azure during a Telestial-sector riot.
Joined The Eclipse as their healer.
members.notes: Feels others' pain deeply; relies on Azure to help him regulate.

members.name: Aileen Eduria
members.bio: Ariata blends Filipino martial tradition with Parliament armor technology, serving as both protector and cultural symbol. She stands beside Will and the Titans with loyalty, grace, and a radiant strength drawn from heritage.
history: Raised in Ophir a Wakanda like city hidden in the Philippines.
Met Will on a stealth operation.
Joined The Eclipse to defend the family she chose.
members.notes: Has a big heart and cares deeply about her team and loved ones.
